name: Fan game fnaf
description:
thank you very much to the person who installe, I'm 100% sure it didn't work, but thanks anyway: If you want to make it work, install visual basic 2010 on clubic, and for smartscreen, there do what you want

language : its french

Histoire / gameplay :

you're a security guard who comes just before midnight, to fix the cameras before the other guard arrives, but be quick, it's 11:59 p.m., if you don't leave before midnight, the other guard won't be able to not come and you would be locked up with the animatronics without being able to close the doors, you have a little fixed price to do the minimum to repair the cameras. and you'll could leave when you're done fixing the cameras. thank you

Instructions :

Apparently it would take a visual basic dll, I don't know very well about it
Don't say it's a virus please, I don't know why smartscreen is mean with my game in quotes, if you don't want to take the risk, it doesn't matter, delete it
